title: Alpha Client won't start up

embed.description: Album with topic of No Topic uploaded by hi2199. Alpha Client won't start

body:
I got accepted to join the alpha testing, but when I downloaded the alpha client, I've never been able to open it.
This is what happens. http://imgur.com/a/S07EI

replies.body:
Since it's Alpha, we offer limited troubleshooting for the client, however, I'd recommend running it as admin (right click, run as admin) and ensure your network settings are 100% compatible with our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure this isn't caused by a poor connection to our servers.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

The connection is fine, but I have to launch it twice as admin for it to show the blue square. I think it might be a hardware issue since the specs on this computer is pretty bad. What are the minimum requirements to run the alpha client? Is it different than the normal client?

System requirements for the Alpha Client should be the same as current system requirements, which are listed [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements/).

Let me know if you have any other questions.
I'm having this same problem and even running it as admin isn't working. If i close it out from the black square it won't even open again.
I'd recommend reporting this behavior on the [Alpha Client Discussion Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) so we can track this.
